(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ my) (NN idea))
        (PP (IN of)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP what))
            (S
              (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NN char) (NN siew))
              (VP (MD should)
                (VP (VB be)
                  (ADJP (JJ like)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(idea-4, This-1)
cop(idea-4, is-2)
poss(idea-4, my-3)
root(ROOT-0, idea-4)
prep(idea-4, of-5)
dobj(like-13, what-6)
det(siew-10, a-7)
amod(siew-10, great-8)
nn(siew-10, char-9)
nsubj(like-13, siew-10)
aux(like-13, should-11)
cop(like-13, be-12)
pcomp(of-5, like-13)

  (S
    (NP
      (NP
        (ADJP (JJ marbled)
          (CC and)
          (JJ juicy))
        (NN meat))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (NNP nicely))))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ charred))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD caramelised)
        (NP
          (NP (NNS bits))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN fat))))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (DT the) (NN outside)))))
    (. .)))

        (S
          (NP (PRP he))
          (VP (MD must)
            (VP (VB have)
              (VP (VBN chosen)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN name) (NN Fatty) (NN cos))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP he))
                      (VP (VBD used)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB be)
                              (NP
                                (NP (DT an) (NN apprentice))
                                (PP (IN of)
                                  (NP (DT the) (JJ famous) (NNP Fatty) (NNP Ox) (NNP HongKong) (NNP BBQ)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))
